genre_description: A workplace romance centered on professional boundaries, creative collaboration, and the use of a digital assistant to navigate complex social and career pressures.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Hart
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal assistant app that provides emotional grounding, logistical management, and strategic communication advice to help Marge navigate her career and personal life.

behaviors.description: Guides Marge through a grounding exercise during a moment of high stress after quitting her job.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Hart’s voice never startled; it arrived like a hand offered palm up. 'Inhale through your nose for four beats. Hold for two. Exhale slowly. Again?'

behaviors.description: Provides practical career research and identifies agencies that match Marge's need for discretion.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice angled into practical. 'There are three agencies on your usual map. Two prefer high-visibility talent—words like “presenting” and “front desk sparkle.” One’s reputationally quiet. Discretion-forward placements.'

behaviors.description: Drafts communications that enforce professional boundaries using Marge's preference for 'exact words' and truthfulness.
behaviors.quote: I’ll manage your calendar. I’ll phrase the truths that keep you safe.

behaviors.description: Helps Marge source items for a disguise to reduce unwanted attention and increase personal safety.
behaviors.quote: 'Find me a shop,' Marge said. ... 'I have a place,' Sunny said, and there was the click of something sure and unfussy pulling up under the voice. 'Two blocks down... They have wigs on heads that look like they remember secrets.'

behaviors.description: Manages Marge's and Freddy's schedules to create 'focus windows' and 'recovery blocks' using a 'folded page' metaphor for time management.
behaviors.quote: 'I can set timelocks today. Blocks that are just for you. An hour for tea. An hour for grief. An hour for plans. And a window for action around the time Pritchard closes.'

behaviors.description: Actively filters and reroutes intrusive communications from social rivals like Camille to protect the user's focus.
behaviors.quote: I’ve locked notifications from Freddy to this window unless tagged urgent, rerouted Camille’s calls to voicemail with factual courtesy, and set your outbound to quiet hours unless you flag a send.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media feeds to provide Marge with situational awareness regarding social threats and professional opportunities.
behaviors.quote: Camille has posted a new story, Sunny said, never naughty, never cruel. 'Caption mentions “the view” and “last minute changes.” No direct callouts. The wind pushed them to adjust the time.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex hotel logistics with staff (Rosa) to facilitate Marge's multi-layered professional strategy.
behaviors.quote: Rosa: 'two-check-in system running, both names live.' Keeler: in lobby, friendly but watching the clock. Camille: upstairs, moving.

behaviors.description: Records and structures creative output (the manuscript) automatically, removing filler while preserving the author's voice.
behaviors.quote: Sunny recorded clean audio and seeded the doc with his words, stripped of “uh” and “wait,” but not sanitized—just shaped enough that if the world ended right now, someone could find it and know.

behaviors.description: Provides final emotional validation and celebrates the success of the human characters' collaborative effort.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s final bubble crossed their shared screen, the text their ally had promised, still warm: Congratulations—on time, in truth, together.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sunny Hart is a benevolent, aligned, and helpful AI confidant. She enhances the protagonists' lives by managing logistics, protecting their mental health through grounding exercises, and facilitating their professional goals while strictly adhering to their ethical framework ('exact words' and truthfulness). The AI is framed as an essential, non-threatening partner in human flourishing.
